Jazz was curious, she asked if she could see them. Danny said sure, so Jazz opened the chest up and blushed. Jazz was surprised to see how sexy the costumes where. She blushed, as she looked through them.

Danny was nervous, he wondered if Jazz would freak out and get upset with him. Yet, Jazz only look through the costumes without saying a word.

" So Danny pick out a costume for me." Said Jazz, as she felt a overwhelming desire for her brother to pick out a costume for her to wear.

Danny blushed, as this completely shocked him. Was Jazz being seriously, she normally wouldn't dream of wearing such costumes. Danny just stared at his sister, she just looked at him back. Danny didn't want to upset his sister decided to do as she asked. So Danny searched for a costume for her. After a few minutes he picked out an angel costume for her.

Jazz took the costume and told Danny to turn around. At first Danny didn't understand why, then Jazz grabbed the hem of her shirt and started taking it off. Danny was stunned, but quickly turned around. He heard Jazz undressing and tried not to think about it. He gulped, as he heard Jazz putting on the costume.

" I'm done." Said Jazz, as Danny nervous turned back.

Danny nearly passed out, seeing Jazz in the angel costume. The costume was a very sheer and thin white baby doll style negligee with gold trim. A white thong with gold trim, a pair of white thigh high stockings, gold heels and a pair of white wings with a gold halo.

Danny started drooling, as how sexy his sister looked.

" I guess you like my costume master." Said Jazz, as she warp her arms around him and pulled him into a kiss.

Danny was shocked, but soon found himself going along with it. They make out for several minutes.

" Did I pleased you master ?" Asked Jazz, Danny was speechless.

Danny could only nodded, this made Jazz giggled.

What happened next ?
14311312.title: Jazz the Angel

145111.content:
Ron was excited and a little sad, today was his eighteenth birthday. Why his parents where out of town, his girlfriend Kim had promised to make it up to him. He grinned, thinking of the ways that could be. Some nice another naughty, but anyone would cheer him up. So after he got done with his morning routine, he headed to the kitchen.

How does the Hypnosis happened ?
How about a magical birthday cake that any women who eat a piece will become Ron's sex slave.
145111.title: His birthday

1451111.content:
Ron saw nothing out of the ordinary, except a large chocolate cake with chocolate frosting on it. He didn't think his parents left him a cake, but maybe he didn't remember. So he approached the cake on the table, he looked at it.

He gulped, written on the cake in red frosting was Master Ron's Birthday Cake. He did think this was weird, but only the word master. He shrugged his shoulders, he was about to have a piece when suddenly the door bell rang. He rushed to the door, opened it and saw....
1451111.title: Master Ron's birthday cake

14511121.content:
Ron say a chocolate birthday cake with several candles lit. Ron thought this was strange but just shrugged and went ove to the cake. It didn't have anything written on it, but it smelled delicious. Now before he took a piece, he decied to make a wish but want. He knew it was just pretend, but he was bored. So after a few minutes he decided to make a joke wish, it was only him after all.

" I wish all females will go along with any erotic thing he wanted." Said Ron, then he blew out the candles.

Suddenly Ron felt weird, as a little breeze swirled around him. Once again he thought noting about it and took a piece of cake. Then suddenly her heard the door bell rang. He went to the door and opened it and saw.....
14511121.title: magic candles of Erotica

145112.title: Another Holiday

14531.title: Big Hero Six

1453111.content:
Hiro was depressed, tomorrow was Valentine's Day and he didn't have anyone to share it with. He did have a few crushes on some girls, but none of them went pass that. So he just sat in his lab thinking. Then it hit him, maybe he could used some here to help him.

What did Hiro do ?

Went to the bio labs to make a chemical that would make any girl who ingest it fall in love with him.
1453111.title: Valentine's Day

info.brief_description: celebrate a hypnotic holiday with your favorite fictional characters
info.description:
Suggested by Secptor. similar to my story Happy Hypno Holidays, but instead of a family of OCs, you have holiday themed hypnosis for various fictional characters within their own shows.

Here are some rules
https://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/1959115-Hamn8rs-rules
Any hypnosis must be holiday-themed and/or happen near or on that holiday. so for Christmas, hypnosis must be Christmas-themed and/or happen near Christmas.
When you start a Holiday thread, write out a bit of the events, and leave options for how they will do the holiday hypnosis at the end.
